entry.title: Hello World!!
entry.summary: After yesterday's late night Hackfest FOSSkriti , I was feeling all drowsy Blogging definetly was not on my plate for the day !!! Thanks to Shiva , he got me quickly on to blogging , we setup the server and DNS entries in half an hour flat. To add to the motivation factor registered â€¦
entry.content: After yesterday's late night Hackfest FOSSkriti , I was feeling all drowsy Blogging definetly was not on my plate for the day !!! Thanks to Shiva , he got me quickly on to blogging , we setup the server and DNS entries in half an hour flat. To add to the motivation factor registered with [STRIKEOUT:First Word Press Conference] WordCamp India, (India's first WordPress Camp), i am looking forward to learn from Pros , what a way to start awesome !!!
